Web & Mobile Apps

Hello! My name is Vance, and I build world-class web and mobile apps.

Work

Blackbird Studios

Mobile App for Interacting with a Camping Lamp

  • Led a team of 2 to build an iOS and Android app
  • Collaborated heavily with a world-class design firm to take product requirements and design, refine, and implement the UI and UX
  • Using the product requirements, designed and implemented the Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) interface
  • Collaborated with China-based manufacturer to ensure the hardware adhered to Bluetooth interface
  • Due to limited hardware availability, wrote a separate software "stand-in" to build against while developing the app. This worked by using a computer's Bluetooth capabilities to advertise the expected Bluetooth capabilities to the app
  • QA'd the product against multiple iOS and Android targets
  • Played Project Lead role responsible for managing the project budget, dictating what features get built when, leading communications with the client, and managing fellow developers.
  • Delivered the final product under a tight deadline and project budget
  • Released on iOS App Store and Google Play store in time for Christmas retail launch

Mobile App for Volleyball Event Series

  • Led a team of 3 to build an iOS and Android app
  • Collaborated with a backend developer to define necessary schema
  • Integrated with backend via GraphQL
  • Integrated with Livestream video service
  • Played Project Lead role responsible for managing the project budget, dictating what features get built when, leading communications with the client, and managing fellow developers.
  • Released on iOS App Store and Google Play store in time for first major sporting event

Mobile App to Improve your Work Commute

  • Worked in a team of 5 to build a consumer facing mobile app for major Auto company
  • Integrated with backend via GraphQL
  • Played auxiliary role supporting project lead and collaborating with backend engineers from client organization.

Web App to Manage Meal Kit Menus

  • Acted as sole developer to build a new version of a web app for managing meal kit menus
  • The app was designed for internal chefs of a popular meal kit delivery service and integrated tool with other internal tools and spreadsheets
  • Collaborated with client to improve major features and add additional workflows
  • Succesfully migrated to version 2 of the app including coordinating the transition of workflows to coincide with the migration of existing data schema
  • Played Project Lead role responsible for managing the project budget, dictating what features get built when, leading communications with the client, and managing fellow developers.
  • Sole developer responsible for app maintenance for more than a year and counting

Web App for Internal Supply Chain Management

  • Worked in team of 2 to build an ingredient sourcing tool for major meal kit supplier.
  • Helped turn product requirements into wireframes and ultimately a finished app in time for a major internal deadline
  • Worked alongside client backend developers to integrate the app with other backend services via JSON API
  • Helped deploy the app to the client's web infrastructure including Dockerizing the app
  • Sole developer responsible for app maintenance for more than 18 months and counting

Validic

Validic Connect Partner API

  • Spearheaded the development of the Validic Partner API to enable dozens of healthcare partners to become part of the Validic healthcare marketplace
  • Played lead developer for API support, documentation, maintenance, and development including a migration to version 2 of the API

Validic Mobile API

  • Primary developer responsible for providing the private Mobile API used by the Validic Mobile SDK and serving 6+ million requests per day

Validc Connect Developer Portal

  • Led development of an API developer portal that provided centralized API keys, documentation, support, and playground environment, and which decreased API implementation time by 70%

Validc API

  • One of four engineers responsible for stabilizing core legacy codebase
  • Doubled test-coverage and halved support tickets over an 8 month period

About

I’m Vance, and I love to solve problems. I crave new challenges, new ideas, and obstacles that require me to grow as an engineer.

When not writing software, I am probably reading, with friends, or out running. My lovely wife, my 1-year old son, and I reside in Winston-Salem, North Carolina.

Contact

Interested in working with me? You can find me at or on social media.
